description:
For the quarterfinals, contestants have to make a bread in less than 60 minutes. Can it be done? Kazuma has the idea to use a microwave, but when Pierrot reveals he absolutely hates them, things don’t look good for Team Japan!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Speed Shoubu!! Are de Chin Shite!
Épreuve de vitesse ! Passe-le au four à micro-ondes !
แข่งความเร็ว!! ขนมปังไมโครเวฟ!
スピード勝負!! アレでチンしてッ!
